subject: Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Beneficiary,
We are happy to announce to you that you have been shortlisted among other beneficiaries by the United Nations Compensation Commission (UNCC) 
as one of the scammed victims to be compensated for losses caused by internet fraudster.
Your Payment Compensation is valued at 2.5 million Dollars (Two Million, Five Hundred Thousand United States Dollars)
Your Payment Reference:  UN/22/CH 980221
To proceed with the disbursement process of your compensation payment, you are required to submit to us the following personal details directly to Dr Jeffery Wilson
Full Names:
Age
Occupation
Telephone Number
Marital Status
Kindly get back to me as soon as possible so that we can proceed to release your Fund.
Treat as urgent
Jeffrey Wilson
For:
UNITED NATIONS COMPENSATION COMMISSION
Tooting Sw17 Oqt London - United Kingdom

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I appreciate the update regarding the United Nations Commission UNCC and the compensation for losses caused by internet fraudsters.

Could you please provide more details on how the process works and what steps I need to take next to proceed with receiving the payment?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Roxann

subject: PAYMENT REQUIREMENTS;
body:
Attention: Dear Beneficiary,

UNITED NATIONS Compensation Commission have been permitted and authorized
to notify and assure you that your Compensation fund of $2,500,000.00 USD
(Two Million Five Hundred Thousand Dollars Only) will duly release to you
accordingly and at the same time it is our duty to clarify you on how you
will receive your Compensation payment.

Your payment has been approved in your name and endorsed by the UNITED
NATIONS Board of Trustee for payment on or before the (5) Five working
limited time frame as signed By the UNITED NATIONS Board of Directors.



To enable us proceed with your payment, you are required to provide us the
required information involve for it immediately to enable us facilitate the
release of your payment;



          PAYMENT REQUIREMENTS;



Account Holder's Name in full:

Bank Account Number

Bank Name/Address

Swift Code

Type-Of-Account

Occupation

Sex

Amount

Age

Marital Status

Home/Office Address

Direct Telephone Number



A scanned copy of either your international passport or driving license or
working identity card



Thanks for your co-operation and for more inquiries and information email
us



Treat as urgent

Dr Jeffery Wilson

For:

UNITED NATIONS COMPENSATION COMMISSION

Tooting Sw17 Oqt London - United Kingdom

subject: Re: PAYMENT REQUIREMENTS;
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. I appreciate your efforts in notifying me about the release of my fund. Could you please provide more details on how the process works and how I can ensure a smooth transaction?

Best wishes,
Roxann

subject: Re: PAYMENT REQUIREMENTS;
body:
Attention: Dear Beneficiary,



Acknowledge the receipt of your email, you are welcome.

Sequel to your complaint about more details on how to receive your funds,
you are required to follow our payment procedures properly as directed to
enable you receive your funds. Kindly provide the details below;



Account Holder's Name:

Bank Account Number

Bank Name/Address

Swift Code

Type-Of-Account

Occupation

Sex

Amount

Age

Marital Status

Home/Office Address

Direct Telephone Number



A scanned copy of either your international passport or driving license or
working identity card



Enclosed is my Identity Card



Treat as urgent

Dr Jeffery Wilson

For:

UNITED NATIONS COMPENSATION COMMISSION

Tooting Sw17 Oqt London - United Kingdom

subject: Re: PAYMENT REQUIREMENTS;
body:
Hello! Thank you for your email. I appreciate the information you've shared with me. Could you please provide more details on how the funds will be transferred? How long does the process usually take?

Best wishes,
Roxann

subject: Thank you for your email. The process usually takes only 3 working days.
body: Thank you for your email. The process usually takes only 3 working days.

subject: Re: Thank you for your email. The process usually takes only 3 working days.
body:
Thank you for the information. Can you provide more details about the process and how it works?

Best wishes,
Roxann
